title: Google | L3| Bangalore| offer
content:
**Previous experience**

**College:** 2021 grad from tier-1 college
**Experience:** 3 years
**Current CTC:** 37LPA
**Current Company:** Part of a big MNC
**Current role:** Software Engineer II

**Salary breakdown in current compan**y
**base:** 24.5 LPA
**performance bonus:** ~ 3 Lakhs
**RSUs:** ~9.1 Lakhs
**Current TC:** ~37LPA

**New offer details**
**Company:** Google, bangalore, india
**Level:** Software engineer II (L3)
**Base:** 23.5 LPA
**Performance Bonus:** 3.5 LPA
**Relocation bonus:** NIL
**joining bonus:** 3 lakhs
**RSUs:** $50k(38%, 32%, 20%,10%) for 4 years
**TC 1st year:** ~47LPA(including performance & joining bonus)

Not sure if I am being low balled here and my current company is even willing to promote me to next level (SSE) within 5-6 months for retaining me since I am the top performer in last 3 years. Can someone help me what would be better decision? Thanks
